sqlMap.select: select pg.PLEDGE_ID from PLEDGE_GIFT pg where pg.GIFT_ID = #giftId#
select pg.GIFT_ID from PLEDGE_GIFT pg where pg.PLEDGE_ID = #pledgeId#

select pg.PLEDGE_ID as pledgeId, SUM(g.AMOUNT) as amountPaid from GIFT g inner join PLEDGE_GIFT pg on pg.GIFT_ID = g.GIFT_ID inner join CONSTITUENT p on p.CONSTITUENT_ID = g.CONSTITUENT_ID where p.SITE_NAME = #siteName# and pg.PLEDGE_ID IN
#pledges[].id#
and g.GIFT_TYPE != 'GIFT_IN_KIND' and g.GIFT_STATUS = 'Paid' group by PLEDGE_ID

select pg.PLEDGE_ID as pledgeId, SUM(ag.ADJUSTED_AMOUNT) as amountPaid from ADJUSTED_GIFT ag inner join GIFT g on g.GIFT_ID = ag.GIFT_ID inner join PLEDGE_GIFT pg on pg.GIFT_ID = g.GIFT_ID inner join CONSTITUENT p on p.CONSTITUENT_ID = g.CONSTITUENT_ID where p.SITE_NAME = #siteName# and pg.PLEDGE_ID IN
#pledges[].id#
and g.GIFT_TYPE != 'GIFT_IN_KIND' and g.GIFT_STATUS = 'Paid' group by PLEDGE_ID
sqlMap.insert:
insert into PLEDGE_GIFT (GIFT_ID, PLEDGE_ID) values (#giftId#, #pledgeId#)
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS value
